msbt.message: It's real darn neat that we can celebrate the Lunar New Year together, !
Is it true that the Lunar New Year is a real celebrate-y day?You can never have too many celebrate-y days! Those are the days with the bestest foods!
Whatcha doin' for Lunar New Year?Me? I'm gonna wake up late, make breakfast for me and the bugsThen lay on the ground and stare at the sky until I feel like I'm gonna fall into the clouds!
There's two new years?! But one's lunar? What does "lunar" mean?Lunar means "moon"? Neat! The moon deserves a holiday. It makes such good cheese! YUM!
I wonder if Grandma and Grandpa are celebrating Lunar New Year back home?I bet they made yummy food! I gotta write a letter and see if Grandma will send some to me!
